thread.title: Madrid and PSG draw in Champions League; City wins late
thread.title_full: Madrid and PSG draw in Champions League; City wins late

title: Madrid and PSG draw in Champions League; City wins late
text:
> Top News Madrid and PSG draw in Champions League; City wins late From left, Moenchengladbach's Fabian Johnson, Granit Xhaka, Thorgan Hazard and Havard Nordtveit leave the pitch after the Champions League, group D soccer match between Juventus and Borussia Moenchengladbach at the Juventus Stadium in Turin, Italy, Wednesday, Oct. 21, 2015. The game ended 0-0. (AP Photo/Massimo Pinca)
